entity.description: This is a type of PartyRelationship so shares the ID with the related PartyRelationship record between employee (fromPartyId) and internal organization (toPartyId) with relationshipTypeEnumId=PrtEmployee.

field.name: taxName
field.description: Defaults to Person or Organization name fields

field.name: taxYtdPriorIncome
field.description: Added to YTD income for starting year only (for taxes limited by YTD income)

field.name: internalPayroll
field.description: If Y is included in year end tax reporting, otherwise considered external pay used only for YTD calculations in payroll adjustments

entity.description: The current and past actual salary amounts for Employment. Current salary found by standard date filter and sort (filter by fromDate, thruDate; sort by ascending fromDate; use first result).

field.name: partyRelationshipId
field.description: If null applies to all employees.

field.name: isTaxable
field.description: For taxable positive adjustments and tax deductible negative adjustments.

field.name: isSocialTaxable
field.description: For social (in USA: Social Security OASDI program) taxable positive adjustments and deductible negative adjustments.

field.name: isMedicalTaxable
field.description: For medical (in USA: Medicare program) taxable positive adjustments and deductible negative adjustments.

field.name: isEmployerPaid
field.description: If Y is paid by the employer and not included in employee pay invoices.

entity.description: An alternative to EmplPosition and Employment to represent an employee in a position class for billing purposes, etc. Can be used in addition to EmplPosition or instead of.
For manager, department/etc internal organization, etc; use Employment entity for employee

moqui.basic.Enumeration.description: Hire - It is a process in which an employee is evaluated by an employer for prospective employment in their company
Exit - It is conducted by an employer of a departing employee
Informal - It is a meeting in which a job seeker asks for advice rather than employment
Case - It is an interview in which the applicant is given a question/situation and asked to resolve it
